Finely grate lemon zest over; save fruit for another use. Top with a few grinds of pepper and drizzle generously with oil.How would you rate Lemon-Pepper Salami Bites?Leave a ReviewTell us what you thinkReviews (3)Back to TopTriangleDelicious!!  Who would have thought lemon and salami would taste so delicious?!  It’s always nice to find a quick, easy, unique appetizer to make.  A Wilson CT 6/19/2021I made this for New Years as well as a host of other Bon Appetite recipes. This was by far my favorite and the easiest! This is my new found favorite appetizer or snack. I’m craving more of these flavor combinations. The lemon zest does magical things! 🍋  RwoodroofLittle Rock, AR1/6/2019Boy was this way better than the sum of its parts. Made for NYE and it was the biggest hit in a huge spread!
